techmeme.title: A look at sports data tech companies like Sportradar, which set betting odds for sports gambling apps and websites, as they build models to keep people betting (Samanth Subramanian/Bloomberg)
The CA-Pacific-Northwest AI Hardware Hub, which is researching hybrid gain cell memory to blend DRAM's density with SRAM's speed, gets a $16.3M CHIPS Act grant (Katherine Bourzac/IEEE Spectrum)
Report: Chinese video surveillance tech supplier Hikvision plans to lay off 1,000+ employees in its R&D department; Hikvision denied any "large-scale lay-offs" (Ann Cao/South China Morning Post)
Sources: Chinese social e-commerce app Xiaohongshu had $200M in net profit on $1B+ revenue in Q1 2024, up from $40M in net profit on ~$600M revenue in Q1 2023 (Eleanor Olcott/Financial Times)
Q&A with physicist Lenka Zdeborová on how the physics of phase transitions in matter can help model the behavior of algorithms, understanding LLMs, and more (John Pavlus/Quanta Magazine)
